case.summary: Application by Beaverdam for an extension of the time for service of Affidavits of Witness, and an order to extend the time for service of the Affidavit and Report from an expert -- HELD: Applicationn granted -- Brewer had Beaverdam's expert report one day late, and all of the witness affidavits 8 days late -- All of this was months before a trial date -- In addition, he had the opportunity to file supplementary witness affidavits and experts' reports if he so chose -- Under these circumstances, he had not suffered any prejudice.
